attributes.additional_details:
Help Remove Facebook Seriously Sick Jokes Page:

http://www.facebook.com/seriouslysickjokes

This page has racist content, hate, and posts that are entirely unnacceptable.

His most recent post

"Tia Sharp's body has been found and the boyfriend of her grandmother is the main suspect....
My guess is she died of an allergic reaction to Hazell's nuts."

And loads of other posts which are worse than this and other users joining in on it. Anyone who looks at this page will realise this has to stop, posts about children who have been killed, racist jokes, jokes about sex with kids etc. This has to stop.

Sign this petition to get the content to try to be removed from facebook.
